DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the safety and tolerability of a single dose of LXR-623 in healthy subjects.
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating LXR-623 in Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Inclusion: Healthy, men or women, aged 1950 years Exlcusion: Use of any investigational or prescription drug within 30 days before study start Any clinically imprtant medical disease or abnormal laboratory test results
